casebody.data:
MANGUM v. UNITED STATES. No. 10384. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit Nov. 30, 1942. Walter A. Nelson and A. M. Mood, both of Fort Worth, Tex., for appellant. Clyde O. Eastus, U. S. Atty., and Frank F. Taylor, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Fort Worth, Tex., and Clyde G. Hood, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Dallas, Tex., for appellee.

Before HOLMES and McCORD, Circuit Judges, and STRUM, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from in this case is affirmed on the authority of United States v. Grieme, 2 Cir., 128 F.2d 811, and Fletcher v. United States, 5 Cir., 129 F.2d 262.
